paper_abstract: In this paper, using binary (N, M, L, epsilon) low correlation zone (LCZ) sequence sets, we construct new quaternary LCZ sequence sets with parameters (2N, 2M, L, 2 epsilon). Binary LCZ sequences for the construction should have period N equivalent to 3 mod 4, L vertical bar N, and the balance property. The proposed method corresponds to a quaternary extension of the extended construction of binary LCZ sequence sets proposed by Kim, Jang, No, and Chung [1].
paper_title: New Construction of Quaternary Low Correlation Zone Sequence Sets from Binary Low Correlation Zone Sequence Sets
